description:
Sam is a really sweet guy who moved from a small town to a big city.
“I love it,” he said. “Back home there’s nothing to do!”
He works full time as an artist, something he’s always enjoyed.
“My brothers and I are all artists,” he said. “It’s something we’ve always done.”
He said he likes to use a variety of mediums.
“My favorite is spray paint,” he said as he showed off some of his skills!
Sam is pretty muscular and he said he loves to work out.
“I’m a huge fitness freak,” he said. “I’m always in the gym!”
title: Sam
